Title: Series: Monuments des arts de dessin chez les peuples
Description: Plate 234: St Zosimas of Palestine encounters St Mary of Egypt in the wilderness; the female saint stands naked and Zosimas, who crouched on a rocky outcrop above her, hands her his mantle to cover herself; in the background, at left, Zosimas burying Mary with the help of a lion; after Alonso Cano. c.1816/29 Lithograph
Producer name: Published by: Baron Dominique Vivant Denon
Curator's comments: From 'Monuments des arts de dessin', see 1856,0209.558 to 973.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (2)
Associated names: Representation of: St Mary of Egypt
Representation of: St Zosimas of Palestine
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
